name: types-everywhere
description: There are a few ways to get TypeScript typings for 3party libraries.   - tsd, package manager for DefinitelyTyped, deprecated   - typings, package manager, includes DefinitelyTyped   - DefinitelyTyped as npm packages, example: https://www.npmjs.com/package/definitely-typed-angular   - @types, as npm packages, from Microsoft, https://www.npmjs.com/~types
